name: Tomato
description: Fresh red tomatoes perfect for curries and salads.

name: Potato
description: Rich in starch, used in fries, curries and snacks.

name: Onion
description: A must-have for Indian cooking, adds flavor to dishes.

name: Carrot
description: Crunchy and sweet carrots rich in vitamin A.

name: Cabbage
description: Green leafy cabbage for curries and salads.

name: Cauliflower
description: Fresh cauliflower florets for frying and curry.

name: Spinach
description: Green spinach leaves full of iron and vitamins.

name: Cucumber
description: Cooling cucumbers perfect for salads.

name: Capsicum
description: Colorful bell peppers for stir-fries.

name: Beans
description: Tender green beans, good for curries and poriyal.

name: Brinjal
description: Purple brinjals for curries and fries.

name: Drumstick
description: Nutritious drumsticks for sambar and curries.

name: Pumpkin
description: Yellow pumpkin rich in nutrients.

name: Bitter Gourd
description: Bitter melon, healthy and good for sugar control.

description: Light and healthy vegetable for curries.

name: Ladyfinger
description: Green okra, sticky and tasty in curries.

name: Radish
description: White radish for sambar and salads.

name: Beetroot
description: Red beetroot rich in iron and vitamins.

name: Ginger

name: Garlic
description: Strong flavored garlic used in almost every dish.
